item.description:
Buddha Hut will host a $10 all-you-can-eat vegan buffet. Come anytime between noon and 7pm and one dollar from every purchase goes to support VegWorcester programs. This is how weâ€™re celebrating the release of our 2009 Vegetarian Dining Guide to Worcester!!
This one is being put on by the Worcester Meetup. I won't be able to attend but the Worcester Meet Up folks are super friendly!
item.how_to_find_us: Please ask to be seated with Meetup, introduce yourself to the group, and enjoy!
item.name: Buddha Hut hosts all-you-can-eat vegan buffet to benefit VegWorcester!
